result.eng: There are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.html: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámhaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna maiṫe ann ionad siopadóireaċta cúpla teaċ táḃairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snáṁaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.

result.eng: It's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.
result.ga: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachta
result.orig: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachta
result.html: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachtaIt's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé gar do lár an ḃaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireaċtaIt's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.

result.eng: She went into the storage place crouching.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.orig: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.html: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí isteaċ san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.
